entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: adding a static field to a struct fails #108301
  • [9.0] Wasm build terminated with exit code 137 #108299
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] Assert: values differ in WebSocketServer_NoUserReadOrWrite_SendsPingAndReadsPongResponse #108298
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete XsltSettings.EnableScript #108287
  • [API Proposal]: Add TimeProvider to CreateLinkedTokenSource #108286
  • `HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext.AddCallback` seems to sometimes add duplicate tags #108284
  • [Profiler] Ability to call `DiagUpdateGenerationBounds()` from profiler API. #108276
  • System.Collections.Immutable aren't runnable with trimming #108274
  • [Profiler] Duplicate `GarbageCollectionFinished` notification #108273
  • [browser] `OnlyPredefinedCultures=true` does not throw an exception when culture is missing #108272
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTaskPerfTest + 3 related #108291
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #108290
  • [MulticoreJIT] Single file deployment does not support ProfileOptimization #108270
  • [illink][ios] Explicitly setting `PublishTrimmed=true` changes the default feature switch configuration #108269
    10.0.0
  • Guid.CreateVersion7 is to slow for my use case, maybe a Version8 could be introduced. #108268
  • Guid.Version does not return correct version in all situations #108267
  • Logging source generator: CS9107 ILogger parameter is captured when use ILogger without generic #108264
    10.0.0
  • HostModel does not reference the version of System.Text.Json that it runs on in the SDK #108262

Closed

  • [cdac] don't use EmbeddedResource in cdac-build-tool #107958
    10.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Should omit `.Reshape` function. #106539
    9.0.0
  • Local build of runtime failing when running CDac tool #107936
    10.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Text.Json, Version=10.0.0.0 #108261
    10.0.0
  • Connecting to IPAddress.Any via HTTP/3 #108259
  • Error when deserializing using system-text-json polymorphism #107595
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity.SetStatus should also set the OpenTelemetry tag #108260
    Future
  • createdump fails on RHEL 8/arm64 with "stack smashing detected" #108023
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert `ReflectionInvocation.CanValueSpecialCast()` to managed #108305
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • [PERF] Pass ScenarioArgs for scenario performance tests #108303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unblock System.Linq testing in nativeAOT outerloop #108302
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/9.0] [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108296
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108283
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #108282
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Change ICU `WasmBuildTests` to use `wasmconsole` and `wasmbrowser` templates #108271
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108266
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Merged

  • Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108246
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Disable System.Collections.Immutable tests on native AOT #108275
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac-build-tool] don't embed resources #108293
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac][tests] Make it easier to set up a unit test #108288
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #107592
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #107591
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #107615
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/9.0] More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #108257
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Remove live System.Text.Json reference from HostModel #108263
    area-HostModel
  • Add test coverage for DirectoryServices.TransformControls #107201
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #107852
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Bring back Microsoft.BCL.Memory netstandard2.1 facade #108245
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code #108265
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Reduce funceval abort #108256
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108244
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add runtime check for unwind get_proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] HTTP client testing #105838
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [iOS] Enable and disable tests for hybrid globalization on Apple #108187
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Unify linking file composition for wasi and wasm. #107547
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
